mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, name , date , hit) values(#{title},#{content}, #{writer} , #{regdate} ,#{viewcnt})
mapper.update: update board set title =#{title}, content =#{content} where idx = #{bno}
mapper.select: select idx as bno, title, content, name as writer, date as regdate, hit as viewcnt from board where idx > 0 order by idx desc, date desc
